CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(Status__c), "Complete", IMAGE("/img/samples/color_green.gif", "green", 10, 10) & " Complete", "Not Started", IMAGE("/img/samples/color_yellow.gif", "yellow", 10, 10) & " Not Started", "Blocked", IMAGE("/img/samples/color_red.gif", "red", 10, 10) & " Blocked", "In Progress", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01530000001G6XM", "blue", 10, 10) & " In Progress", IMAGE("/img/samples/color_yellow.gif", "yellow", 10, 10) & " Not Started")
CustomField.label: Run Status
